title: Unsung Cinderella: Byouin Yakuzaishi Aoi Midori
original_name: アンサングシンデレラ 病院薬剤師 葵みどり
sinopse:
Midori Aoi, 26, works as a 2nd-year pharmacist at a general hospital. Even if she can't be relied on like a doctor and she can't be as close as a nurse, she runs around the hospital in order to protect the patient's "normal day-to-day!"

(Source: Tokuma Shoten, translated)
